original_text: I appeal to you for my child, Onesimus, whose father I became in my imprisonment.
korean_text: 갇힌 중에서 낳은 아들 오네시모를 위하여 네게 간구하노라

sentences.original_text: I appeal to you for my child, Onesimus,
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아들인 오네시모를 위해 당신에게 간청합니다.

sentences.original_text: whose father I became in my imprisonment.
